name: Super Ultra Mega Galley 3000 [LD36]
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 36: Ancient Technology.

Controls:

Keep pressing SPACE to row.

WASD to steer.

Press R to restart.

--------

Tools used:

GameMaker

GIMP

--------

I hope you enjoy the game, even if it's not finished. I didn't have
enough time so there's no sound, better interface and few other things. And let's add to this some bugs and that you can sail off screen.
But it's playable!

Anyway, good luck and have fun!
